name: Nonogram game
description:
A nonogram game prototype (named Nomo) I made with Defold. This works only on Android. My submission for #MadeWithDefold jam.

How to play: choose a level from menu (level 1, 2 or 3) and start filling the image by tapping. There's 3 different filling modes bottom of the screen. You can zoom and move camera with two fingers.

Source code: https://gitlab.com/Apetzu/nonogram-game
